thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Samarla Page
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Samarla Page

author: Samarla Page
title: Samarla Page
text: I ordered a lace front, actually this is my very first one. It came with a free gift which turned out to be a wig cap. It give the option to change what the gift could be so of course I wanted to see what the other options were but it wouldn't let me select a new option. Just wish the wig cap they sent was a flesh tone instead of black. I love elevate styles, I have several wigs from them.
